title: Nothing Ear (stick) will have the price but maybe not all you want in ear buds
description: The Ear (stick) removes some of the in-demand features, like ANC, but adds new ones like Bass Lock for boosting sound.

title: Onyx Boox Tab Ultra brings iPad features to E Ink
description: The Onyx Boox Tab Ultra features a camera and an E Ink screen that is powered by a custom GPU.

title: Microsoft cloud success helps push revenue, offsets Windows and PC drops
description: Microsoft says global economic crisis hitting major areas of its business, although others are thriving.

title: iOS 16.2 and iPadOS 16.2 betas show off new collaborative features and useful bug fixes
description: Besides the new Freeform app, iPadOS and iOS 16.2 attempt to fix some long-standing bugs and improve older tools.

title: The latest version of Python is "the best ever", say devs
description: Python 3.11 is now faster and even easier to develop for, but there’s a catch.

title: Ransomware attacks are down this year - but that's not really a great thing
description: Ransomware still poses a major threat, despite the number of attacks falling.

title: Philips announces Evnia, a PC gaming brand for gamers who hate stale 'gamer' design
description: Philips announced a new gaming brand this weekend, Evnia, and it's trying to finally redefine gamer aesthetic.

title: This iOS 16.1 update makes the Dynamic Island even more useful
description: iOS 16.1 adds new Dynamic Island gestures that let you separate and combine your island app views

title: Amazon will now let you pay using Venmo
description: Amazon customers in the US will be able to pay with Venmo at the checkout in time for Black Friday.

title: Microsoft claims this devious ransomware gang is attacking schools
description: US schools targeted with different ransomware strains including BlackCat.

title: One of Elden Ring's most feared abilities just got a much-needed PvP nerf
description: An infamous Elden Ring ability quickly gets the nerf it deserves after player feedback.

title: You can buy the new iPad and iPad Pro, starting today
description: The iPad 10.9 (2022), iPad Pro 11 (2022), and iPad Pro 12.9 (2022) are all available in stores, starting today.

title: One of the world's biggest ticket websites suffered a multi-year data breach
description: See Tickets website had a skimmer gathering sensitive user payment data for more than two years.

description: More reports of the cable melting on Nvidia’s flagship graphics card are rolling in, unfortunately for those owners.

description: CD Projekt has announced The Witcher Remake, a ground-up reimagining of the original Witcher RPG.

title: Kaspersky rolls out major upgrade on its VPN service
description: Secure Connection VPN users can now enjoy better performances tailored to their needs and up to three times faster.

description: Hundreds of accounts abused in freejacking attacks, costing service providers thousands.

title: There's a really enticing new reason to switch your business to Google Workspace now
description: Google Workspace Individual now offers up to 1TB storage.

title: Cisco AnyConnect urges admins to update now to avoid security threats

title: AMD’s RDNA 3 flagship GPU will do one thing very differently to Nvidia RTX 4090
